entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassCastException, EntityItem, EntityMinion, NullPointerException, Player

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is the abstract Entity class. It is the superclass of pretty much everything that moves.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public abstract void tick()
        Called every tick. AI code should go here.

      • collide

        public abstract void collide(Entity e)
        Will be called whenever the entity collides with another entity.
        Parameters:
        e - the entity collided with

      • damage

        public abstract void damage(int amount,
          Entity damageSource)
        Called whenever the entity takes damage. Animations can be implemented here.
        Parameters:
        amount - how much damage to take
        damageSource - where the damage is coming fromF

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Called every tick to draw the entity on the screen.
